title: Fullstack Web Developer
name: Kuzmin Ruslan, 20 years old
aboutText: I'm a Fullstack Web Developer specializing in building high-performance and feature-rich websites, web applications, Telegram bots, Telegram Mini Apps, and more. I'm ready to tackle the most ambitious challenges, bringing innovative and creative ideas to life using a cutting-edge tech stack!

projectsList.title: Cryptocurrency Exchange Bot
projectsList.description: Developed a bot for buying and selling Bitcoin and Litecoin using Express.js, featuring a user-friendly order creation system and a referral program.

projectsList.title: Mini App Store
projectsList.description: Developed a Mini App for purchasing goods using Spring Boot and JavaScript, with an integrated payment system and selection of pickup points.

projectsList.title: P2P Bot
projectsList.description: Developed a bot for P2P exchanges between users and order holders using Express.js and React, including platform wallets, order holder management, a referral program, and AML verification.

projectsList.title: Music Service Website
projectsList.description: Developed a website for music streaming using Nest.js and Next.js, with features for adding tracks and creating custom albums.

projectsList.title: Quiz Bot
projectsList.description: Developed a bot for conducting quizzes using Spring Boot, featuring a leaderboard and winner announcements upon completion.
